Package reso.utilities

Class NetworkGrapher

java.lang.Object
reso.utilities.NetworkGrapher
public class NetworkGrapher extends Object
This class can be used to generate text file representations of the network graph in AT&T's dot language. Those text files can then be converted to a graph image in .png, .eps or .pdf formats using one of the graphviz tools (neato and fdp are the preferred ones).
See Also:
Graphviz website

  • Method Details

    • toGraphviz

      public static void toGraphviz​(Network network, PrintWriter pw)
      This method generates a representation of a network in graphviz format. The representation contains hosts, routers, links and IGP metrics.
      Parameters:
      network - is the network to represent.
      pw - is a PrintWriter instance to which the textual representation will be written.

    • toGraphviz2

      public static void toGraphviz2​(Network network, IPAddress dst, PrintWriter pw)
      This method generates a representation of a network in graphviz format. The representation contains hosts, routers, links and the routes towards a specific destination.
      Parameters:
      network - is the network to represent.
      dst - is the address of the routes' destination.
      pw - is a PrintWriter instance to which the textual representation will be written.
